title: Amazing View
text: The sunset in Oia is an amazing site. We took the tour bus to Oia from our hotel in Fira and spent the evening in Oia. It is a wonderful city to visit and the sunset view was a sight to remember.

title: A Fun Time
text: This was such a fun experience. It was my first time to Paddle Board and was a great activity. The weather was great. The guides for this tour are so friendly and helpful. I left my shoes at the paddleboard area and called to see if they found them. They were so nice and delivered them to my hotel for me the same evening. So nice!
place: Santorini: Stand-Up Paddle and Snorkel Adventure

title: Such a Fun Experience
text: This was our first meal in Athens and was so amazing. Our hosts, Dimitris and Savvros were so friendly and entertaining. They prepared the most wonderful meal for us and we met some very interesting travelers who joined us for dinner. Their home overlooks the Acropolis and the night time view is just magnificent. I would definitely do this again in the future.

title: Breathtaking!
text: The Acropolis is breathtaking when you finally get there. The walk up is not for the faint of heart. :) Wear gripping shoes and go when it's not humid. But so worth the effort. The pictures that we took can't show how truly fantastic it is.

title: Fun Tour
text: This is a fun, informative tour! Irene, our guide, was very knowledgeable and a lot of fun! A definite must do, if you enjoy learning about foreign cuisine.
place: Private Gourmet Food Walking Tour in Athens
